custom_params.label: MAS
custom_params.tooltip: Mass - creature weight, adds lower octave layers

custom_params.label: SRG
custom_params.tooltip: Surge - upward pitch rise intensity during breach

custom_params.label: SPR
custom_params.tooltip: Spray - water splash and explosion noise

custom_params.label: AIR
custom_params.tooltip: Air - exposure brightness, high frequency content

custom_params.label: DRP
custom_params.tooltip: Drop - gravity's pull, pitch fall after peak
